title: Add support of kzg reference tests

labels.name: Epic Deneb
labels.description: Issues required to implement Deneb upgrade

body:
Format description:
https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/tree/dev/tests/formats/kzg
We could support following types with our API:
- [blob_to_kzg_commitment](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/tests/formats/kzg/blob_to_kzg_commitment.md)
- [compute_blob_kzg_proof](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/tests/formats/kzg/compute_blob_kzg_proof.md)
- [verify_blob_kzg_proof](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/tests/formats/kzg/verify_blob_kzg_proof.md)
- [verify_blob_kzg_proof_batch](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/tests/formats/kzg/verify_blob_kzg_proof_batch.md)

We don't have an open API for [compute_kzg_proof](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/tests/formats/kzg/compute_kzg_proof.md), [verify_kzg_proof](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/tests/formats/kzg/verify_kzg_proof.md) and there are no reasons to open it for reference tests as we are not using it in Teku.
